data.title: Kelly McGillis, then and now
data.meta_description: Far from the Hollywood glitz, Kelly McGillis still practices her craft, but has come out and settled into a "pretty simple" life in Collingswood, N.J., where she married her partner on September 15. The co-star of Hollywood blockbusters such as 'Top Gun' and 'Witness' came out as a lesbian this year.  She married Melanie Leis' civil union was performed in municipal court in Collingswood.  Her bride is an executive with Independence Communications, a company that provides Muzak to businesses.  This is Kelly McGillis then and now.
data.text: Far from the Hollywood glitz, Kelly McGillis still practices her craft, but has come out and settled into a "pretty simple" life in Collingswood, N.J., where she married her partner on September 15. The co-star of Hollywood blockbusters such as 'Top Gun' and 'Witness' came out as a lesbian this year. She married Melanie Leis' civil union was performed in municipal court in Collingswood. Her bride is an executive with Independence Communications, a company that provides Muzak to businesses. This is Kelly McGillis then and now.
